verses.roman:
svarṇārṇa-śata-patraiś ca
vara-reṇuka-jātibhiḥ
kubjakair mallikābhiś ca
mādhavībhiś ca maṇḍitam

synonyms: svarṇārṇa—golden colored; śata-patraiḥ—with lotuses; ca—and; vara-reṇuka-jātibhiḥ—with varas, reṇukas and mālatīs; kubjakaiḥ—with kubjakas; mallikābhiḥ—with mallikās; ca—and; mādhavībhiḥ—with mādhavīs; ca—and; maṇḍitam—decorated.
translation: There are other trees also which decorate the hill, such as the golden lotus flower, the cinnamon tree, mālatī, kubja, mallikā and mādhavī.
